title: Why did "dog" become the insult of choice almost overnight?
body:
I went from seeing it once every 5-6 games to literally watching someone call someone else a dog _every. SIngle. Game.

What the hell is going on and why is everyone _so damn toxic?_ 

I just want to play League without watching a slew of insults fly forth from the mouths of the egotistical and the tilted.
